Merge announcements with ESCO mapping and parse dates

Source: R/crosswalk.R
prepare_annunci_esco.Rd

Joins the announcements table with the ESCO mapping to add Italian profession labels, and parses year/month/day columns into proper IDate fields.

Usage

prepare_annunci_esco(ann, esco_mapping)

Arguments

ann

A data.table of announcements with columns idesco_level_4, year_grab_date, month_grab_date, day_grab_date, year_expire_date, month_expire_date, day_expire_date, and general_id.

esco_mapping

A data.table from read_esco_mapping(), containing at least idesco_level_4 and esco_level_4.

Value

A data.table with added columns it_esco_level_4, gdate (grab date as IDate), and edate (expire date as IDate). Deduplicated to unique combinations of general_id, gdate, idesco_level_4, it_esco_level_4.
